data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Jämtland, Sweden.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jämtland, Sweden
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Jämtland, Sweden to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Jämtland prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Jämtland, Sweden not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Yazidi people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 7,251 believers in Jämtland.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Jämtland, Sweden to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 126,200 people living in Jämtland, Sweden. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

location.name: Jämtland
